clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in right upper lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in right upper lobe.
Focal consolidation in right upper lobe with air bronchogram.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 29 mm in diameter.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in right upper lobe.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
